traits.name: Spellcasting
traits.desc: The witch is a 3rd-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). The witch has the following wizard spells prepared: * Cantrips (at will): mage hand, prestidigitation, ray of frost * 1st level (4 slots): ray of sickness, sleep, Tasha's hideous laughter * 2nd level (2 slots): alter self, invisibility

actions.name: Claws (Requires Alter Self)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6+1) slashing damage. This attack is magical.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) piercing damage.
